ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T17:24:38 [Issue ID 4000-78458] urn:comicvine:4000-78458 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 04:58:32. [Issue ID 98208]
ComicInfo.Summary: Deidamia bears Achilles a son. Nestor agrees to joins Agamemnon's army. Troilus notices Cressida. Agamemnon arrives at Ithaka to enlist Odysseus' aid.
